## Conditions.Convert.validatedConditionSetDecl variable

Converter which constructs a [validated condition set declaration](./ts-res.conditions.ivalidatedconditionsetdecl.md) from a [condition set declaration](./ts-res.conditions.iconditionsetdecl.md)<!-- -->, instantiating qualifiers by name from a supplied [conversion context](./ts-res.conditions.convert.iconditionsetdeclconvertcontext.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**
